title: Change 'Your Workout Plan' section background to green

requirements.text: In WorkoutPlanView.tsx, change the background color of the 'Your Workout Plan' banner/header section to green. Apply a solid green background (e.g., Tailwind class 'bg-green-600' or similar green shade) to the section or container that displays the 'Your Workout Plan' heading.

quotes: where it says your work out plan can you change the background to green

acceptanceCriteria: The section or banner containing the text 'Your Workout Plan' has a green background color
The heading text remains legible against the green background
No other sections or views are unintentionally affected by this color change

constraints: Only change the background of the 'Your Workout Plan' section in WorkoutPlanView.tsx â€” do not alter other views or components
nonGoals: Changing background colors in any other view (MealPlanView, WeeklyScheduleView, etc.)
Modifying the overall app theme or color tokens
